msg: Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository

Fixes bug in Slider animation where we would set the actual value during the animation, ignoring any snapInterval setting. The fix uses the pendingValue property to hold the animated value, which makes the slider look correct, but no actual value update is sent until the animation completes.
Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository
Change the default value of Slider.liveDragging to true
http://bugs.adobe.com/jira/browse/SDK-21923 - Spark Slider controls should set liveDragging to true by default
Changed the global style declaration to set liveDragging = true. Updated ASDoc comments.
Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository
http://bugs.adobe.com/jira/browse/SDK-22044 - SkinnableComponent mouse handling needs to be MarshallPlan compliant

I have updated the track based components mouse handlers to be Marshall Plan compliant. The previous code was using the SkinnableComponent.addSystemHandlers which listen for the event on both the systemManager and the stage. I removed addSystemHandler/removeSystemHandler and added the listeners to the sandbox. I also added listeners for the SandboxMouseEvents for MOUSE_UP_SOMEWHERE.
QE notes: Need marshall plan tests for Slider and ScrollBar
Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository
Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository
Change Slider and NumericStepper default value
http://bugs.adobe.com/jira/browse/SDK-18380 - FxHSlider and FxVSlider have default max of 100, should be 10

Changed the default value for Slider by setting the value to 10 in the constructor. I changed NumericStepper’s implementation to match Slider. The problem with NumericStepper’s previous implementation was that it wasn’t calling Range’s maximum setter. Thus there was some important logic in Range.commitProperties that wasn’t called.
QE Notes: Update tests with new default
Doc Notes: Update docs with new default
